meanings.definition: In a secretive or sneaky manner
meanings.sent1: She moved stealthily through the dark alley, trying not to be seen.
meanings.sent2: The spy crept stealthily past the guards, careful not to make a sound.
meanings.sent3: The ninja stealthily tiptoed around the room, avoiding the squeaky floorboards.
meanings.sent4: The cat stealthily stalked its prey, ready to pounce at any moment.
meanings.sent5: The thief moved stealthily in the shadows, blending in with the night.

meanings.definition: Done in a way that avoids detection or notice
meanings.sent1: He stealthily slipped the key into the lock, hoping no one would hear.
meanings.sent2: The hacker stealthily bypassed the security system, gaining access to confidential information.
meanings.sent3: The magician stealthily swapped the cards, fooling the audience with his sleight of hand.
meanings.sent4: The chameleon stealthily changed its colors to blend in with its surroundings.
meanings.sent5: The student stealthily copied the answers during the exam, trying not to get caught.
